name: building-browser-extensions
description: This is a companion extension for the book [Building Browser Extensions by Matt Frisbie](https://www.amazon.com/Building-Browser-Extensions-Create-Firefox-ebook/dp/B0BN578YT5?maas=maas_adg_BE8EBDC1A30DF0DDA752B166D20FD557_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas). The extension contains a collection of open source examples demonstrating how the various parts of browser extensions work.
